entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to 1300 metres after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
